io.lovelacetech.server.controller

Class AssetTypeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lovelacetech.server.controller.AssetTypeController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/secure/assetTypes")
public class AssetTypeController
extends java.lang.Object
    The API controller for modifying AssetType objects in the database

      • deleteAssetType

        @RequestMapping(value="/{assetTypeName}",
                method=DELETE)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.DefaultApiResponse deleteAssetType(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                               io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String assetTypeName)
        DELETE /api/secure/assetTypes/{assetTypeName}

        Deletes the AssetType with the name "assetTypeName". If any Assets are set to the AssetType with name "assetTypeName", their AssetTypes will be set to the AssetType with default name "Asset". If no AssetType exists with the default name, then a new AssetType will be created.

        RESULT: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": null
 }

        PERMISSIONS
        The user must be an admin at their company
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser - User
        assetTypeName - String
        Returns:
        default
